metadata.description:
House of Peregrine Genesis 
Is a series of 300 1/1 NFTs
from Amsterdam graffiti artist
Laser 3.14.

House of Peregrine is
creating utility at the
intersection of crypto,
co-creation &
international life.

Genesis members are
mercenaries in their
pursuits and relish in a
unique definition of home.
They craft their life story
with intention.

https://www.houseofperegrine.com
metadata.name: HOP Genesis #1
